remarks: A small semigroup (with two elements) with two right identities which are different.  (Contributed by AV, 10-Feb-2020.)
statement:
mgm2nsgrp.s $e |- S = { A , B } $.
mgm2nsgrp.b $e |- ( Base ` M ) = S $.
sgrp2nmnd.o $e |- ( +g ` M ) = ( x e. S , y e. S |-> if ( x = A , A , B ) ) $.
sgrp2nmnd.p $e |- .o. = ( +g ` M ) $.
sgrp2rid2ex $p |- ( ( # ` S ) = 2 -> E. x e. S E. z e. S A. y e. S ( x =/= z /\ ( y .o. x ) = y /\ ( y .o. z ) = y ) ) $.
$d .o. x y z $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d M x $.
$d S x y z $.
